group.title: What is Brain Fog and How Do I Beat It?
group.author: Maurice Beer M.D.

group.excerpt: For those wondering 'why can't i lose weight' or working on the popular keto diet, find out what happens when you go keto and cut sugar and other carbs out of your diet.
group.title: 3 Things That Happen When You Cut Carbs
group.author: Maurice Beer M.D.

group.excerpt: Is eating less the only route to losing weight? Is it a good route? During the pandemic, learn how your stress and cortisol levels can impact your weight.
group.title: How Stress and Cortisol can Impact Your Weight
group.author: Maurice Beer M.D.

group.excerpt: For those wondering about why are they so tired or that want to be smarter and perform better at work but their heads feel foggy or cloudy. Learn what are the causes of brain fog.
group.title: What are the Causes of Brain Fog?
group.author: Maurice Beer M.D.

group.excerpt: Discover how to track down your vitamin B12 and Vitamin D deficiencies leading to symptoms like chronic fatigue or brain fog. Discover the problem with at-home test plans & nutritional and supplements
group.title: How to Fix Your B-12 and Vitamin D Deficiency with Data
group.author: Maurice Beer M.D.

group.excerpt: Boosting brain health and concentration levels is possible with a little help from the diet. Add these nutrients to your plate to banish brain fog or the feeling of foggy head once and for all
group.title: 5 Nutrients To Fight Brain Fog
group.author: Natalie Rizzo RD

group.excerpt: It's difficult to find information about personalized nutrition or keto. We tell the story around finding a diet and lifestyle routine that works via at-home lab testing to find optimal health.
group.title: RIP Wellness advertising; from Keto diet to personalized nutrition, supplements and lifestyle
group.author: Lola Priego

group.excerpt: Diet can have a particularly profound impact on your mood, since your food choices can directly influence your body and mental health. 5 strategies to help you eat your way to a better mood.
group.title: Eat Your Way to a Better Mood
group.author: Dr Bay
